Package org.libex.concurrent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Caller
    Implements the ability to execute a Callable possible on the invoking thread.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcurrentFinalizableSettableOnce<T>
    A wrapper for a field that should only be set once and can be finalized.
    ConcurrentRunningAverage
    Maintains a running average in a thread-safe manner.
    ConcurrentSettableOnce<T>
    A thread-safe wrapper for a field that should only be set once.
    DateSupplier
    Provides the current system Date in a test-overridable manner.
    Delayeds
    Utility methods for Delayed instances.
    SimpleBarrier
    A barrier that will block all thread when closed and allow all thread to continue when open.
    TimedCounter
    Maintains the count of event during the most recent time period.
    TimedCounter.Snapshot  
    TimeSpan
    Specifies a period of time.
    TimeSpanCounter  
    TimeSpanCounter.TimeSpanCount  
    TimeUnitsEx
    Utilities on TimeUnit
